title: n0okie
author: n0okie
content: Well Focus with me guys, I'm a digital marketing guy, and I just got into NFTS and blockchain i really love the idea behind blockchain I studied computer science but been years since I didn't wrote a code, so I created a simple API for NFTs profit calculator which is simple as a freelance project: https://chainwitcher.com/nft-profit-calculator/ but still I'm afraid to invest a lot of time studying more into Solidity cause I'm thinking to go full time studying.SO WHAT DO U THINK? SHOULD I QUIT MY JOB and GO ALL IN OR TAKE FOREVER and STUDY Dev 2 HOURS A DAYOR STAY Where I AM?
